name: Pumpkin Spice Hot Chocolate Mix
description: Alton Brown's recipe for Pumpkin Spice Hot Chocolate Mix.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice (or 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger, 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg)

recipeInstructions.text: Sift all the ingredients together in a large bowl. Transfer the mixture to an airtight container. It will keep for up to six months. To make hot chocolate: place 3 tablespoons of the mix in a mug and top with hot water or milk. Stir until combined.
